item.description:
A rollicking concert for a Saturday night on the New Haven Green: The Grammy- nominated Carolina Chocolate Drops are the newest and youngest players in a long line of black string bands. Rolling Stone Magazine says, “The Carolina Chocolate Drops are...revisiting, with a joyful vengeance, black string-band and jug band music of the ’20s and ’30s—the dirt- floor dance electricity of the Missippi sheiks and Cannon’s Jug stompers.”

Opening Act

Caravan of Thieves has, since 2008, won immediate praise for its unique blend of Gypsy swing and popular music, appealing to folk, pop, rock and jazz audiences of all ages.

Bring Your Favorite bottle of wine and a yummy appetizer to share - and maybe a little chocolate to share in celebration of the singers :-)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: A Concert You Don't Want To Miss "Carolina Chocolate Drops"
